Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Dear all, Seeing that I am still positive on COVID, I suggest we do tomorrow's lecture fully online. Please join the following link for the session: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/2047551305?pwd=cThwZEVhZ3hhSjNySWM5b0x2ZlJIUT09 Kind regards Manuel

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Dear all, Sadly, I am COVID positive. I will repeat the self-test on Thursday morning, and will let you know then.  If I am negative by then, we will have the lecture physically at the university, otherwise we will do it online. If we do it online, please use this zoom link to connect to the session:  https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/2047551305?pwd=cThwZEVhZ3hhSjNySWM5b0x2ZlJIUT09 Best regards Manuel

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Email address to send your slides

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Email address to send your slides in PDF format, with the name of your team in the file name: Manuel.ortega@mse.tu-berlin.de

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Dear all, Tomorrow is your mid-term review. Since we will have 8 groups presenting, you will all have 15 minutes of presentation time + 2 minutes for questions.  We need to finish at 17:00 sharply, as I will have to leave to the airport at that time, so please do not spend more time than 15 minutes on your slides! Viel Erfolg Manuel

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Lean Satellite: Delivering Satellite Values with Low Cost and Short Time

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Maybe some of you are interested in this guest lecture: Liebe Kollegen,   am Mittwoch, den 15.05., wird uns Professor Mengu Cho (Joint appointment am Kyushu Institute of Technology und Chiba Institute of Technology) besuchen. Er wird von 14:00 bis 15:30 Uhr eine Gastvorlesung im Raum MAR 0.003 (offiziell 24 Sitzplätze aber da lässt sich garantiert was machen) mit dem Titel „Lean Satellite: Delivering Satellite Values with Low Cost and Short Time“ im Rahmen meiner Veranstaltung „In Space Manufacturing“ halten. )   Aufgrund eines formalen Fehlers im MTS wurde meine Lehrveranstaltung keinem Studiengang zugeordnet, was zu einer geringen Teilnehmerzahl geführt hat. Ich würde mich daher sehr freuen, wenn ihr eure Studierenden ermutigen könntet, an der Vorlesung am Mittwoch teilzunehmen, damit Professor Cho nicht vor leeren Rängen steht. Ich freue mich auf eine kurze Rückmeldung.   Liebe Grüße Khalil

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Dear all, Just a small clarification: The habitat/project is for 6 crew members, stationed permanently in the habitat. Best regards Manuel

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Enclosed is the airbus internship we showed in class. Do check the Airbus Careers page or OHB careers page for more opportunities: https://www.airbus.com/en/careers/students-and-graduates/interns/internships-in-germany https://www.ohb.de/en/career/students

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: Dear all, I have now activated the registration for the course #50174 Human Spaceflight on Moses/MTS. Please check that you can register to the course properly for the examination. Best regards Manuel

Messages.Author: Manuel Ortega
Messages.Content: We would like to call attention to the Space Station Design Workshop 2024. Many things are changing on the SSDW: it is now a cooperation between two human spaceflight professorships, the Technical University of Munich (Prof. Detrell) and the University of Stuttgart (Prof. Olthoff). As in previous years, the SSDW addresses master and PhD students as well as young professionals with less than three years of work experience. The one-week challenge constitutes the unique opportunity to apply theoretical knowledge in an international and interdisciplinary environment in order to design a concept for a future space station under guidance from experts from industry and academia. Further information about the workshop can be found on our website: www.SpaceStationDesignWorkshop.com We would kindly ask you to forward the information below. Furthermore, we attached a poster, which, if wanted, can be printed and hanged at feasible boards / locations. We are also going to publish information regarding the workshop in social media (Twitter @SpaceStationDW and Instagram @spacestationdw) Your help is highly appreciated, thank you in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us. Kind regards,
